DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness Sight Sciences VISCO™360 Viscosurgical System reduce intraocular pressure ( IOP ) adult , pseudophakic subject open-angle glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Safety Effectiveness Sight Sciences VISCO™360 Viscosurgical System Versus SLT Primary Open Angle Glaucoma ( VISCO360 Study )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed primary openangle glaucoma ( POAG ) study eye . Pseudophakic Posterior Chamber IOL ( PCIOL ) Able willing attend follow visit two year postoperative Able willing sign inform consent Phakia aphakia Previous glaucoma procedure without implantable glaucoma device ( include incisional surgery , ALT , iridectomy/iridotomy , etc . ) [ Subjects one prior SLT application ( > 3 month prior screen ) prior ECP ( perform > 12 month prior screen ) enrol ] . Use 3 ocular hypotensive medication ( combination medication count 2 medication ) Diagnosis acute angle closure , traumatic , congenital , malignant , uveitic , pseudoexfoliative , pigmentary neovascular glaucoma Abnormal angle anatomy determine gonioscopy ( e.g . peripheral anterior synechiae , rubeosis angle abnormality ) Participation clinical trial ≤ 30 day prior screen
